text: Hagi miko vahera neginagi hu'za antahintahi omane vahe mani'naze. Golireti'ma havi anumzantamima tro'ma hu'naza vahe'mo'za, anazama tro'ma hu'naza zankura tusi zamagazegu hugahaze. Na'ankure ana amema'ama tro'ma hu'naza zantamina havigeza tro hu'naze. Ana havi anumzantamimo'za zamasimura ante'za kasefara hu'za nomanize.
